name: Siege of the Dead
description:
The dead have risen and are attacking a local church! You are the holy mouse pointer which has been called upon to smite the zombies to save this place of worship.

There's not much to this game due to my lack of experience (and lack of time!). I aim to work on it a little more before Demo Day so feel free to leave some constructive criticism.

Controls:

Left click: Advances the splash screen to start the game

Mouse movement: Kills zombies

R: Restarts after defeat

You need Java to run this game
